meanings.definition: (ギリシア神話)ビトン：クレオビスとビトンは、ヘーラ神殿への祭りで、女神官である母を牛車の代わりに曳いて参じたアルゴスの兄弟。その孝行心に感銘を受けたヘーラーの計らいで、二人はその夜のうちに安らかな死を与えられた。
meanings.english_definition: (Greek mythology) Biton: With Cleobis, one of two Argive brothers who, when their mother, a priestess of Hera, was unable to find oxen to take her to a festival of the goddess, pulled her cart the entire way. Impressed by their filial piety, Hera granted them the gift of dying peacefully in their sleep that night.
